data.text: @TerrySheehanMP You are only in the Government for your Pension you never worked a day in your life you are a Dictator like your boss and you think its great to hold Canadians hostage in our own country. You are an embarrassment our  city and country .

@Evelynne24 @TerrySheehanMP Heâ€™s at most a perennial backbencher just happy to be there to carry water for JT. He contributes nothing and just continues to be another vote to support the party line. We deserve better that this.

@TerrySheehanMP Not everyone has a cell phone, Terry.  You've been told this multiple times!  Yet your inept government has made it harder than ever for the elderly to travel outside of Canada, be it to visit family or for leisure.  I think there's a name for this...discrimination!

@thetaxpayer1 @TerrySheehanMP So true, Brian.  But I'm sure you too are well aware that Terry, being a true Liberal cares nothing about his constituents or Canadians, he's all about that nice fat pension!  Just another empty promises in a suit!
#VoteLiberalsGone

@nevermi52910059 @TerrySheehanMP You will never hear back from him.  He's about as useless as lipstick on a pig.  He's there for the big pension, that's it.  Terry is the typical Liberal, caring not for any of his constituents or Canadians.
#VoteLiberalsGone

@TerrySheehanMP Price gouging at Port Huron/Sarnia bridge has meant $110CDN walk-in for antigen tests.  Appointments for cheaper tests are booked a week in advance.  Please help end the mandates for those of us who work and have family in the US.  https://t.co/sefO4LUgy1
@TerrySheehanMP All of this is unnecessary Terry.
